Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Perfrin (natural AMPs; antimicrobial protein; bacteriocins, Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes)

Literature.Author: Timbermont L1, De Smet L, Van Nieuwerburgh F, Parreira VR, Van Driessche G, Haesebrouck F, Ducatelle R, Prescott J, Deforce D, Devreese B, Van Immerseel F.2014
Literature.Title: Perfrin, a novel bacteriocin associated with netB positive Clostridium perfringens strains from broilers with necrotic enteritis.

Sequence Information.Comments: Inhibited multiple Broiler C. perfringens strains. This bacteriocin did not show clear homology with currently known bacteriocins, indicating a new member. Updated 10/2020
